about.title: ‚ÑπÔ∏è About Psychic Chat
about.label: About Us
about.content:
Psychic Chat is a spiritual wellness app that combines ancient astrological wisdom with modern AI technology to provide personalized cosmic insights. Our mission is to help you explore your cosmic destiny through birth charts, daily horoscopes, moon phases, and intuitive guidance.

Whether you're seeking clarity on relationships, career decisions, or personal growth, our AI-powered oracle offers thoughtful perspectives rooted in astrological traditions.

For questions, contact support@psychicchat.com or use the Help Chat feature.
